headline: Could The Data Center Bubble Be About To Pop--Lux Capital Heavyweight Sees Warning Signs
summary: Data centers have been one of the most pleasant surprises in the real estate sector, generating strong returns for real estate investment trust investors for the last several years. The massive facilities are mission-critical pieces of AI infrastructure, which explains why many of the world's biggest tech companies have multi-billion-dollar data center investments.
